message: Let's start fair, I get most of the money now, but the next offer is yours and the money will be worth less then.
You got a good chunk last round, now it's my turn to get a bigger share!
I'll compromise a bit, but we need to be reasonable here. This is the last round before I get less than half of the money.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up too much!
